description: This source file implements a set of invocation functions for a module called Slap Sco Standard Object, providing mechanisms to invoke methods with fixed input parameter counts. It includes detailed functions for calling methods with 0 to 8 fixed parameters, handling method descriptors and parameter lists, using function pointers and parameter resolution functions.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput0(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with zero fixed input parameters, executes the method pointer based on method descriptor.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with one fixed input parameter, executing method pointer based on descriptor.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with two fixed input parameters, calling method pointer with appropriate arguments.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput3(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with three fixed input parameters.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput4(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with four fixed input parameters.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput5(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with five fixed input parameters.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput6(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with six fixed input parameters.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput7(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with seven fixed input parameters.

methods.name: void * SlapScoStdInvokeFixInput8(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMethodDescriptor,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_out)
methods.description: Invokes a method with eight fixed input parameters.
